entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 50
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT
